channel.title: RuneScape DemonWars Weekly Update {new 525 is coming up!}
channel.description:
[size=24pt]Please reply if you like it or not or else i will remove![/size]
[size=24pt]RuneScape[/size]
[size=24pt]Demon Wars[/size]
[size=12pt]My latest project.[/size]
[shadow=red,left][size=12pt]Weekly Update[/size][/shadow]
1: [size=36pt]CONSTITUTION[/size] Yes for the first time on a 508 server Constitution this will mean that your life will start on 100 hp and the max will be 990.
the NPC'S will also hit 10X more. so 10hp will become 100hp this will look even better with the 562 defensivehit sprite, ill upload pics when im done adding a few details.
2: Skill master emote. the skillmasters (NPC'S) will now do the emote related to their skillcape. this is to make the game more alive-like.
3: PLAYER NPC'S i have found some player related npc's in the npc list,
with this i have added some random npc's near varrock and lumby.
AND i have added some npc's with special attack option to a familiar PVP zone.
4: Custom Items. i have fully added the custom items to both the server and client. so now when you wield a primal 2h you will get the name on the attack style menu
5: New Sprites.
i have added some new sprites such as: new hp bar of 614, and new hit effect of 614 that applies to the 10x health multiplier
6: {525} Stealing Creation Yes i am busy making my own variant of stealing creation. i will update this page as soon as i have more onfo
7: Houses Greets, i am working on my own version of Construction.
Explain:
Now in every big city (as: varrock camelot ect) you can buy a empty house and add furniture to it, more explaination will be added soon
INFO:
bcuz rune claws are incompattible at a 508 server, adding dragon claws will only give drop and inv model so i cant get the char to wear them... if some1 knows how to fix that id appriciate it. OW and if some1 can help me with it i will (if u want) make you a MOD on my server. (bcuz you helped get the server online)
[size=18pt] This is a Weekly Update.[/size]
[size=24pt] Greetings From Owner [shadow=red,left]DemonWars[/shadow][/size]

item.title: RuneScape DemonWars Weekly Update {new 525 is coming up!}
item.dc:creator: @DemonWars DemonWars
item.description:
@DemonWars wrote:

[size=24pt]Please reply if you like it or not or else i will remove![/size]

[size=24pt]RuneScape[/size]

[size=24pt]Demon Wars[/size]

[size=12pt]My latest project.[/size]

[shadow=red,left][size=12pt]Weekly Update[/size][/shadow]

1: [size=36pt]CONSTITUTION[/size]
Yes for the first time on a 508 server Constitution
this will mean that your life will start on 100 hp and the max will be 990.

the NPC’S will also hit 10X more. so 10hp will become 100hp
this will look even better with the 562 defensivehit sprite, ill upload pics when im done adding a few details.

2: Skill master emote.
the skillmasters (NPC’S)
will now do the emote related to their skillcape.
this is to make the game more alive-like.

3: PLAYER NPC’S
i have found some player related npc’s in the npc list,

with this i have added some random npc’s near varrock and lumby.

AND i have added some npc’s with special attack option to a familiar PVP zone.

4: Custom Items.
i have fully added the custom items to both the server and client.
so now when you wield a primal 2h you will get the name on the attack style menu

5: New Sprites.

i have added some new sprites such as: new hp bar of 614, and new hit effect of 614 that applies to the 10x health multiplier

6: {525} Stealing Creation
Yes i am busy making my own variant of stealing creation.
i will update this page as soon as i have more onfo

7: Houses
Greets, i am working on my own version of Construction.

Explain:

Now in every big city (as: varrock camelot ect) you can buy a empty house and add furniture to it, more explaination will be added soon

INFO:

bcuz rune claws are incompattible at a 508 server, adding dragon claws will only give drop and inv model so i cant get the char to wear them…
if some1 knows how to fix that id appriciate it.
OW and if some1 can help me with it i will (if u want) make you a MOD on my server. (bcuz you helped get the server online)

[size=18pt] This is a Weekly Update.[/size]

[size=24pt] Greetings From Owner [shadow=red,left]DemonWars[/shadow][/size]

Read full topic
